overview:
Yonit is the co-founder of Yooguide. She is a marketing and sales manager, with over ten years of experience.

Last year, Yonit has founded Yooguide, a startup in the consumer-internet-mobile space, together with Shirley Cohen-Mintz and Eran Lobl. Throughout her eight year tenure at Bezeqâ€™s Business Customer Division, Yonit filled several roles. In her most recent position as business customersâ€™ relationship management, Yonit built and managed a customer retention and nurturing program.
Yonit holds BA in General Studies with a major in International Diplomatic Relationship from Haifa University
